QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Increase Check Orignal and Updated Amounts Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Compare the Updated Sponsorship Gift Amount with the Recurring gift amount and the Original Sponsorship Gift Amount with the Backup
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select rsplit.REVENUEID, r.CONSTITUENTID, i.ID as INSTALLMENTID, srs.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, r.AMOUNT as RGAMOUNT, rb.AMOUNT as BACKUPAMOUNT, i.DATE as INSTALLMENTDATE, i.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT as INSTALLMENTAMOUNT, dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT_GETINSTALLMENTBALANCE(i.ID) as INSTALLMENTBALANCE, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, r.LOOKUPID as REVENUELOOKUPID
from dbo.USR_SPONSOR_RATECHANGE_SPONSORSHIPS srs join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.ID = srs.SPONSORSHIPID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s2 on s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = s2.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID and s2.ISMOSTRECENTFORCOMMITMENT = 1 join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on rsplit.ID = s2.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch on rsch.ID = r.ID join dbo.USR_RATEINCREASE_REVENUEBACKUP rb on r.ID = rb.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = s2.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT i on i.REVENUEID = r.ID
where srs.INCREASERATE = 1 and s2.STATUSCODE = 1 and (srs.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT <> rb.AMOUNT or srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT <> r.AMOUNT )
